about_the_game:
We can't save the world alone, the OSA needs you soldier - enlist NOW by wishlisting Zero Caliber 2!

### THE SEQUEL ###

Your favorite all-in-one VR FPS made infinitely better! Get ready to experience the thrill of your virtual life in Zero Caliber 2, the sequel to our critically acclaimed Zero Caliber military shooter!

We took everything we learned during Zero Caliber's develoment, mixed it with our community's feedback and suggestions - the result will be mind blowingly awesome! Cinematic action, explosions, tons of weapons to unlock, a full-blown single player/Co-op campaign (taking place after the events of the prequel), PvP, native mod support, zombies, airstrikes and more explosions. A VR experience you'll never forget!

Coming to your VR gear in 2024.

### COMMUNITY ###

To catch sneak peeks and behind the scenes stuff, join our awesome community on Discord:
-> discord.gg/xrealgames

content_descriptors.notes: First person shooter violence and strong language.
